title: King Richard
sinopse: A look at how tennis superstars Venus and Serena Williams became who they are after the coaching from their father Richard Williams.

title: Jhund

sinopse: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

title: Home Team

title: The Replacements

title: American Underdog
sinopse: The story of NFL MVP and Hall of Fame quarterback Kurt Warner, who went from stocking shelves at a supermarket to becoming an American Football star.

title: Coach Carter
sinopse: Controversy surrounds high school basketball coach Ken Carter after he benches his entire team for breaking their academic contract with him.

title: The Karate Kid
sinopse: A martial arts master agrees to teach karate to a bullied teenager.

title: Cars
sinopse: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

title: The Phantom of the Open

title: Rocky

title: The Longest Yard
sinopse: Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.

title: The Mighty Ducks

title: Rush
sinopse: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

sinopse: Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella is inspired by a voice he can't ignore to pursue a dream he can hardly believe. Supported by his wife, Ray begins the quest by turning his ordinary cornfield into a place where dreams can come true.

title: McFarland, USA

On June 25, 1983, the Lord's Cricket Ground witnessed 14 men beat the two times World Champions West Indies, putting India back onto the cricket world stage.

title: She's the Man
sinopse: When her brother decides to ditch for a couple weeks, Viola heads over to his elite boarding school, disguised as him, and proceeds to fall for his school's star soccer player, and soon learns she's not the only one with romantic troubles.

sinopse: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

sinopse: A foul-mouthed former gymnastics bronze medalist with local celebrity status reluctantly trains a rising Olympics aspirant.

Enrolled in an elite gymnastics program run by the legendary Burt Vickerman (Jeff Bridges), Haley's rebellious attitude gives way to something that just might be called team spirit.

sinopse: An aimless young man who is scalping tickets, gambling, and drinking, agrees to coach a Little League team from the Cabrini Green housing project in Chicago as a condition of getting a loan from a friend.

In 1947, Jackie Robinson becomes the first African-American to play in Major League Baseball in the modern era when he was signed by the Brooklyn Dodgers and faces considerable racism in the process.

sinopse: A frustrated and conflicted teenager arrives at a new high school to discover an underground fight club and meet a classmate who begins to coerce him into fighting.

title: D2: The Mighty Ducks
sinopse: Can Gordon's team win the Junior Goodwill Games in California in spite of all the set-backs?

title: Into the Wind
sinopse: She graduated from a prestigious high school in Warsaw and entered medicine in London. He works as a kitesurfing instructor at the seaside, thanks to which he combines earning money and ... See full summary »

sinopse: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

sinopse: The story of one young man, Cru Jones, who has the intensity and desire to win a BMX race called Helltrack.

title: Ice Princess
